statements: SELECT * FROM reward_signals;
SELECT signal_id, reward_value FROM reward_signals WHERE episode_id = 10;
SELECT episode_id, SUM(reward_value) AS total_reward FROM reward_signals GROUP BY episode_id;
SELECT * FROM reward_signals WHERE reward_value > 0 ORDER BY reward_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM reward_signals WHERE episode_id = 5 AND reward_value < 0.5 ORDER BY step_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM reward_signals WHERE reward_value > 0 ORDER BY episode_id DESC, step_number ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT signal_id, episode_id, reward_value FROM reward_signals WHERE episode_id = 10 OR step_number BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT episode_id, MAX(reward_value) AS max_reward FROM reward_signals GROUP BY episode_id HAVING max_reward > 0.5 ORDER BY max_reward DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT episode_id) AS unique_episodes, AVG(reward_value) AS avg_reward FROM reward_signals;
SELECT * FROM reward_signals WHERE reward_value < 0.5 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM rewards_log;
SELECT timestamp, reward_value FROM rewards_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM agent_training_info WHERE training_loss > 0.5;
SELECT agent_id, training_epoch, AVG(training_loss) FROM agent_training_info GROUP BY agent_id;
SELECT * FROM rewards_log WHERE step_number BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM rewards_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM agent_training_info WHERE training_loss > 0.5 ORDER BY agent_id ASC, training_epoch DESC;
SELECT timestamp, SUM(reward_value) AS total_reward FROM rewards_log GROUP BY timestamp;
SELECT agent_id, AVG(training_loss) AS avg_loss FROM agent_training_info GROUP BY agent_id ORDER BY avg_loss DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards_log JOIN agent_training_info ON rewards_log.step_number = agent_training_info.training_epoch;
SELECT * FROM reward_signals ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT timestamp, reward_value FROM reward_signals WHERE reward_value > 0;
SELECT agent_id, action, reward_received FROM agent_logs WHERE action = 'jump' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT agent_id, state_json, action_taken FROM training_data WHERE reward_received < 0;
SELECT agent_id, state_json FROM training_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM reward_signals WHERE reward_value > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT agent_id, action FROM agent_logs WHERE reward_received < 0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT agent_id, state_json FROM training_data WHERE action_taken = 'move' AND reward_received > 0 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT agent_id, action_taken, reward_received FROM training_data WHERE state_json ->> 'location' = 'Room A' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM agent_logs INNER JOIN training_data ON agent_logs.agent_id = training_data.agent_id WHERE agent_logs.reward_received = training_data.reward_received AND training_data.action_taken = 'jump';
SELECT * FROM Rewards;
SELECT AgentID, RewardValue FROM Rewards;
SELECT EnvironmentName, EnvironmentType FROM Environments;
SELECT LogID, AgentID, TimeStamp, LogMessage FROM TrainingLogs;
SELECT AgentName, AgentType FROM Agents;
SELECT * FROM Rewards ORDER BY TimeStamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AgentName, RewardValue FROM Rewards JOIN Agents ON Rewards.AgentID = Agents.AgentID WHERE RewardValue > 100 ORDER BY RewardValue DESC;
SELECT AgentName, EnvironmentName FROM Agents JOIN Environments ON Agents.EnvironmentID = Environments.EnvironmentID WHERE AgentType = 'AI' ORDER BY AgentName ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalRewards, AVG(RewardValue) AS AvgReward FROM Rewards;

SELECT AgentName, EnvironmentName, LogMessage FROM Agents JOIN TrainingLogs ON Agents.AgentID = TrainingLogs.AgentID WHERE TrainingLogs.LogMessage IS NOT NULL ORDER BY AgentName ASC, TimeStamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT training_id, timestamp, reward_value FROM rewards
SELECT episode_id, training_id, episode_duration FROM training_episodes
SELECT action_id, episode_id, action_name, action_value FROM actions
SELECT state_id, episode_id, state_name, state_value FROM states
SELECT policy_id, training_id, policy_name, policy_value FROM policies
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_value DESC;
SELECT episode_id, episode_duration FROM training_episodes WHERE training_id = 3;
SELECT action_name, action_value FROM actions WHERE episode_id = 10 ORDER BY action_value DESC;
SELECT state_name, state_value FROM states WHERE state_value >= 50;
SELECT policy_name, policy_value FROM policies WHERE policy_value < 0.5;
